lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic is a fan of the round-robin format in tennis, and he would even like to see it used at the Olympics and the Davis Cup.
snippet: Novak Djokovic is a fan of the round-robin format in tennis, and he would even like to see it used at the Olympics and the Davis Cup....

headline.main: Djokovic Suggests Round-Robin Format for Olympics, Davis Cup
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Suggests Round-Robin Format for Olympics, Davis Cup
